    • Method Detail

      • rescaleReactionRate

        public static javax.measure.Quantity<javax.measure.quantity.Frequency> rescaleReactionRate(javax.measure.Quantity<javax.measure.quantity.Frequency> unscaledQuantity,
                                                                                           javax.measure.Quantity<javax.measure.quantity.Time> targetScale)
        Scales the reaction rate for the use with cellular graph automata. The unscaled quantity is transformed to the unit specified by target time and multiplied by the value of the time scale.
        Parameters:
        unscaledQuantity - The quantity that is to be scaled.
        targetScale - The required time step.
        Returns:
        The scaled reaction rate.

      • rescaleDiffusivity

        public static javax.measure.Quantity<Diffusivity> rescaleDiffusivity(javax.measure.Quantity<Diffusivity> unscaledQuantity,
                                                                     javax.measure.Quantity<javax.measure.quantity.Time> targetTimeScale,
                                                                     javax.measure.Quantity<javax.measure.quantity.Length> targetLengthScale)
        Scales the diffusivity for the use with cellular graph automata. The unscaled quantity is transformed to the unit specified by target time and length scales. Further the unscaled quantity is divided by the squared length scale and multiplied by the time scale.
        Parameters:
        unscaledQuantity - The quantity that is to be scaled.
        targetTimeScale - The required time step.
        targetLengthScale - The required spatial step.
        Returns:
        The scaled diffusivity.
